title: Tap5ive
description: Send Hi5's to strangers in real-time!
This is an example of a completely random project that serves no useful purpose at all. In an attempt to learn real-time capabilities of Web Sockets using Node.js, I came up with this project.

The idea of sending anonymous Hi5's randomly struck me, and within a few hours I had this up and running. To my surprise, people actually enjoyed using this app which I once thought was plain useless!
